page.title: 10DALWOOD PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Dalwood Primary School is a small village school with two classes. There are two full time teachers and thirty six children,17 in the Infant class and 19 in the Juniors. There is a playing field, a swimming pool, a play ground and a pond. A new pool changing room and play structure has been built by Dalwood School Association.The children learn Math - ematics, English, Reading, Topic Work, Crafts,Games and P.E, Art&Craft,Music, Recorders,R.E, Science, Environmental Studies, and how to use the computer. The school joins with other small schools for some projects. This year they spent a week in Plymouth with Kilmington school and met penfriends from Stoke Damerel School, Plymouth.Once a year they take part in Area Sports, Country Dancing, Cycling Proficiency and Maypole Dancing.
